title: 820-4824-A  Back Light Melt Down fixed.   Now Wrong Way
message:
I should of never tried to fix this board, but it's the weekend and on weekends I play in the toy box!
This board had a back light melt down! U7700 burnt off multiple traces down to the ground plane so I had to make them from scratch! I am sure we have all seen this.

After I fixed it now I get a "Wrong Way" sign after it shows the apple logo for a second. What is wrong way?

I have tried my test SSD and my external USB test drive. Both have the same problem.  The SSD is APFS the external is the old file system.  Both show a apple logo for a second.

title: 820-4824-A  Back Light Melt Down fixed.   Now Wrong Way
message:
Did you try USB OSX disconnecting internal SSD?
ALso try to start from pendrive installer and see what happens.
